title: nODadiru para
sahitya:
nODadiru para strIyara


anupallavi

  nOdidare kEDahadu tappadidakO


caraNam 1    nODidare strI hatyavu nuDisi mA tADidare gO hatyavu 
kADidare shishu hatyavu mai gUDidare brahma hatyavu
    caraNam 2    eraLe gangaLeyolumege maruLAgi baride nI keDabEDavO 
duruLa yama lOkadalli karedoidu urigaMbavappisuvarO
    caraNam 3    maruLu mAnavane kELO para satiyu uriyendu nODu nitya 
varada purandara viTTalana nenedare sthiravAda mukutiya hudu
